A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was amazing. Anyone who thinks this movie was horrible must not have saw the same movie...people criticize the force awakens for having the same plot as new hope and that its too similar so now we get something new and excited but with familiar parts and themes that a Star Wars movie must have. Every part of the Rey kylo Luke snoke plot was perfection and the Poe and Leia story line was great as well each character had a flaws but realized what they had to do in the end kylo realized he had to let go of his conflict and become the ruler Rey realized that even though her parents arent there for her she isnt alone and luke realized he cant abandon hope and his friends and family everything comes together beautifully and the action scenes are great... everything new they did with the force was awesome to see a new side of the force and its expanding powers. The only real problem in the movie is the weird animal chase scene with Finn and rose. I liked the new characters DJ was cool even though he was just out for some cash. The jokes for me worked and luke was classic cocky cry baby luke that had some funny moments and thats ok. Overall this movie was great and Id watch it 1928271 more times before I watched any prequel and dare I say this is as good as a Star Wars movie as empire. I think I will... 9.8/10
